resources:
aShell You // There are translatable strings in 'commands' and 'changelogs' modules Access denied You might need to accept a prompt on the other device if you are trying to connect to it for the first time from this device ADB device connected. ADB device not connected. Waiting for ADB device ADB shell Add bookmark About Accept You are using the latest version Amoled black theme Pure black theme for devices with OLED panel aShell You is here for all your ADB needs App is updated, want to see changelogs? aShell You is still working. Please wait for it to finish or manually stop (by clicking the stop button) to run a new command
This feature is currently in its experimental phase. If you encounter any issues please let us know. Bookmarks '%s' is bookmarked %d commands are bookmarked Maximum bookmark limit reached! Delete some bookmarks to add new ones '%s' has been removed from bookmarks %d commands are removed from bookmarks %d commands are pinned %d commands are unpinned Cancel Changelogs Check your internet connection Choose Are you sure you want to clear everything on this screen? Clear everything Clear screen Clipboard doesn't contain text Commands Input ADB command here Input ADB Command Confirm Selected %d items will be added to bookmarks Selected %d items will be removed from bookmarks Confirm delete Warning ! This action is irreversible
Are you sure you want to delete all bookmarks? All unpinned commands will be pinned
Do you wish to continue? \[%s\] will be pinned
Do you wish to continue? Do you want to unpin the selected commands? \[%s\] will be unpinned
Do you wish to continue? Connected Connected device connecting… confirm authorization on target device Copy Copied to clipboard Default working mode Delete all Choose the default working mode for running ADB commands Device not connected Discord Join the discord community Dismiss Disabled Don't show again Download Error Example Examples Failed Failed to generate and save key pair Flashing Go back History Instructions Least used Local ADB Menu Most used None No command No command found that matches your query OK Open ADB shell OTG Device is not properly connected. Connect the device properly through OTG and try again Paste Pin '%s' has been pinned Press back again to exit aShell You is still working. Do you want to stop the current process? Progress Quit Do you want to quit aShell You? Remember last working mode Request Permission Save Root commands are not available Search Search commands here Search output here Selected Select all Search in commands summary? Settings setAdbInterface(device, intf) fail Auto run shared commands If enabled then sharing any text to aShell You automatically runs the shell with the shared text as input The output of last command is not saved The output of last command is exported to '%s' folder Shell is working About Shizuku Access to Shizuku service is denied for aShell You. aShell You won't work without a proper Shizuku environment. Shizuku is unavailable Shizuku is not installed or not properly configured on your device. aShell You won't work without a proper Shizuku environment. Sort A ‚Üí Z Z ‚Üí A Newest Oldest Start Success Support aShell You is not designed for root-related uses. Aborting. Unpin '%s' has been unpinned All info cards will be visible now Update available ! A newer version of aShell You is available !
Click on Download button to get the new version from the repository Important You need to turn on USB Debugging in the developer settings of the target device Use Waiting for device Warning What's new ! Working mode Yes
Smooth scrolling Enables smooth scrolling in the shell output when top or bottom arrow is clicked Ask before clearing shell output If enabled a confirmation popup will show after you click the Clear screen button Auto update check Automatically checks for available newer versions when the app launches Override maximum bookmarks limit Might cause lag if a large number of bookmarks are added! Low end devices should keep this option turned off Disable soft keyboard Useful when you want to use an external keyboard Collection of some command templates Unhide info cards All information cards will be visible again History of all the changes made to the app Version , Credits Lead developer Just a guy who loves apps and design Contributors Developer of Shizuku
The main functionality provider of aShell You Developer of aShell
Without him aShell You wouldn't exist Developer of ADB‚ö°OTG
Thanks to him OTG feature could be implemented in aShell You The best guy in the world has been an incredible help. Without him, aShell wouldn't be here. Thanks a ton for your support, buddy! Developer of Iconify
